QuestData.Title: Lion Stalkin'
QuestData.Description:
The hills are crawlin' with lions that stalk their prey from afar. These big cats will pounce at anything that catches their eye, including |5$r.
While most would fall to such a formidable predator, anyone in my huntin' party would be able to best those beasts.
Prove you've got what it takes by taking down a few of those stalkers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt Pinerock Stalkers and Prowlers in Pinerock Basin.
QuestData.CompletionText: Anyone worthy of huntin' in these hills should be able to take down a few stalkers.
QuestData.RewardText: Not a scratch on ya that I can see. I bet those lions never saw ya comin'!

Objectives.Objective: Pinerock Prowlers and Pinerock Stalkers slain
